title: Medical Education
description: Morsani College of Medicine at the University of South Florida awards doctorates in Medicine (MD) and Medical Sciences (PhD). Specially designed programs are also available, including combined MD/MBA, MD/MPH, DPT/MPH programs, SELECT programs, and an Honors Research program. The future of Medicine starts with you!
cleaned_text: is in Tampa Bay USF Health Morsani College of Medicine and Heart Institute is now open in downtown Tampa. Champions in Academic Medicine Over the past 50 years, the USF Health Morsani College of Medicine (MCOM) has played a leading role in the health and well-being of our region, serving as Tampa Bay's champion in academic medicine. [See How](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0_gTEFVn2rI) Points of Success By educating the next generation of physician leaders, driving scientific innovation and discovery, and providing exceptional care to more than 1,000,000 patients annually, MCOM harnesses the power of academic medicine to fuel transformative health advancements in Tampa Bay and beyond. [Learn More](https://health.usf.edu/medicine/points-of-success) At the USF Health Morsani College of Medicine (MCOM), we believe that academic medicine drives better learning outcomes, accelerates collaborative discoveries, and makes life better for the patients, families, and communities we serve in Tampa Bay and beyond. Our faculty, staff, students and alumni make our college of medicine a place where the power of academic medicine thrives.
